title: Is Kannada course part of syllabus?
content: VTU syllabus has Kannada mandatory in 2nd and 3rd Sem. Is this the case in PES also?

comments.body: PES doesnt even have english, forget kannada

Does pes come under vtu for it to be mandated by their rules ?
Stop asking such illogical questions . 
If you use 2 and a half grams of intelligence , this world would be a better place

Think twice before asking anything , not just because you can ....
